fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Shoot someone at night, or hide yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You are able to shoot someone at night to deal a Powerful attack, or hide yourself to gain Basic Defense, Control Immunity, Roleblock Immunity, and role-masking from Consiglieres and Potion Masters. Shooting a Non-Mafia or Non-Coven will result in you unable to attack or hide the next night. Hiding has 4 uses.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Mafia/Coven Lose
